name: Spanish Pronunciation
description: Are you learning Spanish? You can practice and improve your Spanish pronunciation with this simple app. It works offline and so is very handy. Learn Spanish pronunciation by listening to how words are pronounced and repeating them. It is important to learn the right pronunciation of Spanish words from the beginning.   Learn and improve your Spanish speaking vocabulary the right way by practicing Spanish pronunciation every day. Learn Spanish daily through practice using this Spanish Pronunciation app to improve your Spanish pronunciations.   Spanish Pronunciation app is a quick tool to reach out to when in doubt. Simply enter the text and you will hear a pronunciation of the text. Learn Spanish in an easy way by remembering all the words you learn.  Just use this app anytime youre confused about the right pronunciation of a word. It is very useful to all, students, tourists, teachers, workers, etc. who may need to check the pronunciation of a word on the go. It is a simple app to help you learn and speak Spanish the right way.  Speak confidently with your friends, boss, colleagues, and tourists. Good pronunciation is essential for learning, speaking and understanding Spanish well. This app is not about Spanish grammar but simply a tool to aid your pronunciation of Spanish text and numbers.  The ultimate mobile Spanish pronunciation aid, for all. The Spanish Pronunciation app helps you learn, practice and play with words wherever you are. Spanish Pronunciation app teaches you how to learn to pronounce Spanish text properly.   Main Features:  - Clear pronunciation of words  - Simple straightforward interface - Type a number and hear its pronunciation in Spanish - Keeps history of learned words - Swipe learned words left or right to delete them - Small app size - Works OFFLINE - Settings screen to regulate speech rate and pitch
